In England, in the seven days to 02 May, there were 12,058 new confirmed cases (21.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 April, there were 13,549 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 11% (1,491 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 07 May is 3,871,255 (6,877.7 cases per 100,000 population).
